meanings.sent1: The juicinesses of the ripe watermelon made it a refreshing treat.
meanings.sent2: I love the juicinesses of a perfectly cooked steak.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret to creating the juicinesses in her burgers was adding a special marinade.
meanings.sent4: The juicinesses of the gossip spread quickly through the office.
meanings.sent5: The juicinesses of the orange burst with flavor in every bite.

meanings.definition: The state of being full of juice.
meanings.sent1: The juicinesses of the fruits at the market were irresistible.
meanings.sent2: The juicinesses of the berries made them perfect for a summer dessert.
meanings.sent3: The watermelon's juicinesses made it a messy but delicious snack.
meanings.sent4: The juicinesses of the freshly squeezed juice were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The juicinesses of the steak left a savory taste on my palate.
